column4: How does one fix overscan with an intel hd3000 chip :( I can't figure it out
you should be using the latest of things, X11 and kernel.. the X11 by default understands the 'intel' driver
I'm on 12.04, all up to date. It outputs to the TV, but it just cuts 20px from all the edges
that doesnt sound good.. is it just the font that appears too large or does it include desktop space?
